system.requirements:
Tier 1; WS 35, Ag 35
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence, Khorne
system.effect:
Character counts as having the Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities.
Natural Weapons: Natural Weapon does 1d10 + Strength Bonus Damage with Primitive (7), cannot parry with natural weapons, nor be disarmed except through literal disarming.

description.value: Character counts as having the Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities. Natural Weapons: Natural Weapon does 1d10 + Strength Bonus Damage with Primitive (7), cannot parry with natural weapons, nor be disarmed except through literal disarming.
